name: Fiery Fight
overview: A two player dueling game with one person with a ship on the top and the other on the bottom of the screen. You can set the shot speed and choose from some great music from Torben Korgaard Hansen & Chris Ammermüller. Other than that, no frills or score kept just you against your buddies. Published in Tiger-Crew-Disk #035 (02/1997).
